descriptions: Hi I'm Zhao Wu, a prospective [NUS College (NUSC)](https://nuscollege.nus.edu.sg/about-us/) undergraduate majoring in [Computer Science (CS)](https://www.comp.nus.edu.sg/programmes/ug/cs/).
I'm a conscientiously driven individual ([INFJ-A](https://www.16personalities.com/infj-personality)), with an extensive track-record in leadership, project management, and event planning.

Before moving on to my next exciting chapter, I graduated as the Gold Medalist from [SP's Diploma in Applied AI and Analytics (DAAA - S30)](https://www.sp.edu.sg/soc/courses/full-time-diplomas/applied-AI-and-analytics/overview). This journey fueled my passion for technology and artificial intelligence, propelling me one step closer to my career aspiration of an AI Engineer, building applications that empower people through AI.

Outside the tech realm, I find solace in the **outdoors**. Whether it's cycling, jogging, hiking, or my newfound love for reading, I relish every opportunity to explore and unwind. (*Find me on **[Strava](https://www.strava.com/athletes/67402211)** and **[Goodreads](https://www.goodreads.com/user/show/170027850-zhao-wu-wong)***!)
I'm on a continuous quest for self-improvement, always eager to connect with like-minded individuals who share my enthusiasm for growth and learning.

experience.title: Chairperson, AI Student Developer Conference 2023
descriptions: Leading a team of student organizers with diverse educational backgrounds and skillset.
Liaising with event management vendors and industry partners like NVIDIA, Govtech, SAP, SCS and Pand.ai to ensure smooth execution of the conference.

Moderating a fireside chat on what it takes to bring machine learning to life into a real-world AI project and how Machine Learning Operations (ML-Ops) is implemented in real-world AI project with industry professional.
Spearheading the development of a Firebase native companion application for gamification elements during Track 3: AI Playground.

experience.title: AI Engineer Intern
descriptions: Modularize and optimize signal processing functions into Python API across multiple research-oriented programme (e.g. Matlab, Origin)
Attached to an active research project as data analyst to clean, process, visualize and presenting the insights and recommendations gathered to relevant stakeholders.
Ongoing trial for the use of supervised contrastive learning for material classification.

experience.title: President & Founder, SPAI Student Chapter
descriptions: Founded and led the student committee to build a community of AI Enthusiast in SP through numerous student initiated workshops, competition and student-led projects.
Awarded the Outstanding Contributions (Group) Excellence Award with over 200 members across different schools all within the first year of existence.
